title: The Token Interview: Signing to a Major, Being White, Technical Rapping & More
description:
Token joins Adam to talk about his new album 'Pink Is Better’, the evolution of his career, maturing and growing up in the public eye, and being in a place where he doesn't have anything to prove anymore! He just wants to tell his story. https://www.instagram.com/tokenhiphop/
